short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds spaces to huge numbers on web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension adds space to every large number, per each 3 digits, for easier readability.
Changes 12345 -> 12 345.
This is simple script, does not collect any data and does nothing else.
